description:
English Punctuation Made Simple

This is a revolutionary Accelerated English Punctuation Self-Study course. It has been created to inspire, encourage and most importantly, EQUIP you with all essential punctuation in the English language which will help you grow as a person to a level of optimal performance in your professional, academic and personal life.

Quick Overview of what you will learn:

1) The Period - the simplest of the punctuation marks to use!

2) The Comma - How to make your meaning clear

3) The Exclamation Mark - How to express exasperation, astonishment, or surprise!

4) The Exclamation Mark - How to express exasperation, astonishment, or surprise!

5) The Question Mark - How to find out more about people!

6) The Semicolon - How to join phrases

7) The Semicolon - How to join phrases

8) The Quotation Mark - How to cite what others are saying!

9) The Apostrophe - How to express Possession!

10) Hyphens and Dashes - How to join and separate statements!

11) Parentheses and Brackets
title: English Punctuation Made Simple!
